title: From a guy who doesn't have a great family or friends
body:
It sucks, and I'm so done with all this. I haven't had any money to eat for 3 days, and the people who I think are my friends are not my friends.

Then again that's coming from someone with insane mental disorders and a disgusting past, and depression so consuming I'm jealous of it.

replies.body:
I don't know where you're from, but if you need help, there are people you can talk to.

In the US you can call this number 24/7: 1-800-273-8255

[This is a list of Canada lines you can call.](http://www.suicide.org/hotlines/international/canada-suicide-hotlines.html)

And if you just wanna vent on the boards over here, I'll check back every so often :)

Best'a luck man; life's touch but things will get better.

- Jun

I've been trying to sell my computer for 3 weeks now just to buy food

Have you tried unemployment claims or food stamps?  Looking up local food drives? Places that feed the homeless? Local church programs? There's a lot of places to look and resources to take advantage of. I know it's difficult, I've been there. But its not the end of the world, and people will help if you let them. Maybe not the one's you'd expect, but sometimes strangers are so much kinder than the ones we used to call friends.

I don't think I'd qualify for those programs as I make a decent (but still shitty amount) of money. My bills are too high and I get 1/3 of my income taxed
Dude idk if this is bait or not but there are better places to go for help than league boards, if you are in trouble please seek out proper help and support.
